entry.title: Storm System Kills at Least 22 People Across Central U.S.
entry.content: Fueled by a series of rotating thunderstorms, the weather system felled trees and power lines and battered homes across at least eight states.

entry.title: Russia Says Boosting Military Production as Campaign in Ukraine Stalls
entry.content: The Kremlin says it is ramping up production of ammunition for its front-line forces in Ukraine as it continued a push to seize territory there despite suffering heavy losses.

entry.title: Rising Atlantic Ocean Engulfs Fishing Town in Brazil
entry.content: Climate change has increased sea levels, scientists say, and Atafona is an extreme example of the challenge that lies ahead in a country with some 4,600 miles of coastline.

entry.title: Venezuelan Migrant Endured Poverty, Trek to Mexico Before Fire
entry.content: A brother is mourning one of 39 migrants who died at a detention facility in Ciudad Ju√°rez, Mexico.
